profile:
The Appliance Force's team of Appliance professionals have over 30 years of experience providing Calgary appliance repair services.  With Appliance Force you will get professionally trained technicians who will deliver efficient and timely service tailored to your situation. From a washing machine repair to a refrigerator installation, our technicians will treat you and your home with respect. 

Each member of our repair team is a provincially registered professional technician, which means you can count on us to do the job right the first time. Our repair team is committed to exceptional customers service, so you can be guaranteed clean, friendly and profession service with every visit.


We promise to:
 •   Provide prompt, efficient, timely service
  •  Charge by the job not by the hour
  •  Guarantee on all work and  parts 

At Appliance Force we service all major household appliances including:
Washing Machines
Clothes Dryers
Refrigerators
Freezers
Dishwashers
Ovens, Ranges and Stoves

EXCELLENCE AND PROFESSIONALISM
COMPLETE SOLUTIONS
SAFETY CULTURE

At Elektra Energy, our customer's satisfaction and opinions are our number one priority.  We have a team of professionals that are dedicated to their work, who strive to meet our customer's needs every day and would go out of their way to ensure our clients are happy with our services before we leave a job site.

We are a Full-Service Electrical Solutions Contractor working with Commercial, Residential and Industrial partners.

​The foundation of our company culture is Safety.  We ensure our team follows all safety standards with training, communication and follow-up.  As Covid 19 has impacted our communities and the way we do business, we have implemented strict guidelines to ensure compliance at all times.

services:
We Are The Appliance Repair Experts
Trust the experts at Elektra Energy with your appliance diagnostics and repairs.  We have extensive experience with most major brands and all types of appliances!  Why Trust Elektra Energy?

Quick Turnaround Time, often same day service 

Licensed Journeymen 

Competitive rates and in-home & business services

Access to parts and components

Residential & Commercial Appliance Service
specialities:
Washers, Dryers, Dishwashers and everything in between!
Reliable and fast service, we come to you.  Dryer not heating, washer not washing?  We get it! These are essential and understand the urgency to get them fixed right away.  Give us a call today!

All Kitchen Appliances
From Gas Ranges to Fridges, Freezers, Stoves and microwaves!  Trust our experts to fix any issues fast and affordable.  

Small Appliances
We also fix mixers, blenders, microwaves and all household small appliances.  Give us a call today!

profile:
SMS Appliances quickly turned into Canada’s appliance retailer of choice, gaining an outstanding reputation for repairing, retailing, and installing top-of-the-range home appliances. Over the years, SMS Appliances has grown from a repairs and installations service provider to also operating as a retail outlet for Canada’s modern property holders as well. 
Here at SMS Appliances, we not only sell new and reconditioned appliances, but we also provide outstanding customer service, installations, and repairs to residential customers in Canada.

At SMS Appliances, we pride ourselves with providing quality products and services to our customers, be it maintenance repairs, new appliances or refurbished machines. All of our used appliances go through an extensive audit process to make sure that any appliance you purchase is built to last.

SMS Appliances provide repair services for all major appliances brands. Be it refrigerators, stoves, washers, or dryers. We understand that your schedule may be demanding, so we offer same day services as well as try to give next day delivery on purchases. We also provide a warranty with each purchase along with a few delivery options. 

We service, repair and install all types and brands of major appliances such as washers, dryers, refrigerators, stoves, ovens, and dishwashers. We employ highly trained technicians to ensure timely and proper service to our new and long time clients. All labor and parts are guaranteed. We stand proudly behind our work. When you need a quality appliances or repair, contact SMS Appliances
